item.title: @elonmusk: The fundamental assumption behind multiculturalism is that all cultures are essentially like ours in...
item.description: The fundamental assumption behind multiculturalism is that all cultures are essentially like ours in core values. Not only is this assumption factually false - it is also guilty of the very colonialist universalism they claim to oppose!

item.title: @elonmusk: So if showing ID to vote is racist‚Ä¶ Showing ID to fly is racist. Showing ID to buy a gun is racist. ...
item.description: So if showing ID to vote is racist‚Ä¶ Showing ID to fly is racist. Showing ID to buy a gun is racist. Showing ID to enter a bar is racist. Showing ID to open a bank account is racist. Showing ID to buy tobacco or alcohol is racist. And on and on. We all know the real reason.
